cc.mallet.fst.semi_supervised.constraints

Class SelfTransitionGEConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.mallet.fst.semi_supervised.constraints.SelfTransitionGEConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GEConstraint

    public class SelfTransitionGEConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements GEConstraint
    GE Constraint on the probability of self-transitions in the FST.
    Author:
    Gregory Druck
